title: Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies in Complex Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Learners include students and job seekers who collaborate with peers from diverse backgrounds to share mathematical problem-solving processes, with activities designed for smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three mathematical problem-solving strategies within a blended learning community
Learners can improve mathematical modeling by incorporating peer feedback through network-based collaborative activities
Learners can propose creative approaches to solving real-life problems through knowledge integration across diverse learning communities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
